summary.span: 當做 控制項的根類別。

span.span: Serves as the root class of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會公開的所有屬性、 方法和 Chart Web 控制項的事件。This class exposes all of the properties, methods and events of the Chart Web control. 兩個重要屬性類別和屬性，這兩者都是集合屬性。Two important properties of the class are the and properties, both of which are collection properties. 集合屬性儲存區物件，用來儲存資料會顯示，以及該資料的屬性。The collection property stores objects, which are used to store data that is to be displayed, along with attributes of that data. 集合屬性儲存區主要用來繪製使用一組座標軸的一或多個圖表的物件。The collection property stores objects, which are primarily used to draw one or more charts using one set of axes.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式來建立的新執行個體在執行階段類別。You can use this constructor to create a new instance of the class at run time. 不過，為了簡單起見，建議您建立在設計階段的執行個體。However, for simplicity, it is recommended that you create a instance at design time. 這是根物件控制項。This is the root object of the control.

param.name: series
param.span: 以逗號分隔的數列清單，這些數列的資料點會使用資料點座標軸標籤，對齊 X 軸。

span.span: A comma-separated list of series that will have their data points aligned to the X axis using the data point axis labels.

summary.span: 使用資料點的座標軸標籤，將不同數列的資料點沿著 X 軸對齊。

span.span: Aligns data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels.

summary.span: 圖表中指定的數列都會以遞增排序順序對齊。

span.span: The specified series in the chart are aligned using an ascending sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會用來對齊資料點沿著 X 軸，使用的座標軸標籤中，不同系列的而且也適用於當：This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - 多個數列會顯示，也會編製索引;也就是所有資料點都有為 0，則屬性是`true`。Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an of 0, or the property is `true`. - 所有資料點都必須是唯一的非空白軸標籤其。All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their . 如果它們不是唯一的就會擲回例外狀況。If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown. 這種情況下是很常見，資料繫結所產生的多個數列，建立和`string`值會用於 x 軸值。This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values. 當多個編製索引時，會發生兩個問題會繪製數列，並使用設定 X 值`string`值：Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - 無法保證沿著 X 軸相同的索引處，將會繪製資料點的 X 值的相同字串有不同的系列。It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis. - 只有第一個數列中的資料點的座標軸標籤將會顯示，即使其他數列具有相同索引中的資料點軸標籤太。Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too. 根據預設，會繪製點會儲存在其文章系列中的順序。By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series. 若要指定排序次序，請使用`AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel`方法多載具有`sortingOrder`參數。To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定是否要在繪製文字與圖形時使用消除鋸齒。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.

value.span: 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消除鋸齒填補像素為單位的中繼顏色、 smoothens 出 「 鋸齒狀邊緣 」，而是特別適用於不會繪製為矩形的圖表的邊緣變平滑。Anti-aliasing smoothens out "jagged edges" by padding pixels with intermediate colors, and is especially effective for smoothing out edges for charts that are not drawn as rectangles. 比方說，是非常有效的折線圖和圓形圖，消除鋸齒，但不是有效的橫條和直條圖。For example, anti-aliasing is very effective for line charts and pie charts, but is not as effective for bar and column charts. 消除鋸齒可以套用至文字及/或圖形的基本型別，例如矩形、 圓形和其他等等。Anti-aliasing can be applied to text and/or graphics primitives such as rectangles, circles, and so forth. 請注意消除鋸齒會影響效能。Note that anti-aliasing will affect performance.

span.span: Sets the automatically assigned series and data point colors, to allow programmatic access at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當色彩會自動指派在執行階段、 沒有辦法知道色彩將會在時間圖表的轉譯時之前,`Color`自動指派值的屬性會傳回這一次。When the colors are automatically assigned at run time, there is no way to know what the colors will be prior to the time when the chart rendered; the `Color` property of an automatically assigned value will return at this time. 如果您呼叫，數列和資料點的色彩會設定方法，這可讓您以程式設計方式存取。If you call the method, the colors for the series and the data points will be set, which allows for programmatic access.

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值來設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 請注意，針對物件時，無法設定 alpha 元件為 255 以外的值。Note that for the object, the alpha component cannot be set to a value other than 255. 這也表示，如物件，值不可用。This also means that, for the object only, a value cannot be used. 值將會是如果您要用於背景漸層色彩使用的第一個色彩。The value will be the first color used if you are using gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值會控制色彩的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果您設定此色彩為 「 透明 」 — 也就是如果您使用的 alpha 值為 0-沒有色彩會指派給標題的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 如此一來，背景就是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent. 下表代表支援漸層類型：The following table represents the types that support gradients: |序列類型Series Types|2D2D|3D3D| |------------------|--------|--------| |橫條圖Bar|XX|-| |盒狀圖Box Plot|XX|XX| |泡泡圖Bubble|-|-| |K 隨身碟Candle Stick|XX|XX| |資料行Column|XX|XX| |環圈圖Doughnut|XX|-| |誤差線Error Bar|-|-| |快速的線條Fast Line|-|-| |快速點Fast Point|-|-| |漏斗圖Funnel|XX|XX| |甘特圖Gantt|XX|-| |KagiKagi|-|-| |線Line|-|-| |圓形圖Pie|XX|-| |點Point|-|-| |點數圖Point and Figure|XX|-| |極座標圖Polar|-|-| |金字塔圖Pyramid|XX|XX| |雷達圖Radar|XX|XX| |範圍的資料行Range Column|XX|-| |磚形圖Renko|XX|-| |曲線Spline|-|-| |曲線區域的區域Spline Area Area|XX|-| |曲線範圍圖Spline Range|XX|-| |堆疊區域Stacked Area|XX|-| |堆疊的區域圖 100Stacked Area 100|XX|-| |堆疊橫條Stacked Bar|XX|-| |堆疊橫條 100Stacked Bar 100|XX|-| |堆疊直條Stacked Column|XX|-| |堆疊的直條圖 100Stacked Column 100|XX|-| |階梯線圖Step Line|-|-| |股票圖Stock|-|-| |新三價線圖Three Line Break|XX|-|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性定義的背景影像路徑圖例中，而且可以是絕對或相對的 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要調整影像的位置，請使用和屬性。To position the image, use the and properties. 您也可以指定其中一個設定為 「 透明 」 映像所顯示的色彩屬性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 從任何支援的.NET Framework，包括圖示的有效圖形檔產生映像。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層停駐的色彩。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定影像顯示的方式，例如，並排顯示、 縮放，等等。This property determines how the image is displayed, for example, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果調整映像，將會自動縮放以符合圖表的範圍內。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart. 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從圖表的左上角開始。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart. 如需可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果屬性設定為，其中繪製影像的位置由屬性設定。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Customize As EventHandler

summary.span: 恰好於圖表影像繪製前發生。

span.span: Occurs just before the chart image is drawn.

summary.span: 所有圖表資料都可以使用，而且所有圖表屬性都已設定。

span.span: All chart data is available and all chart properties have been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件有兩個獨特的功能：This event has two unique features: - 所有的圖表資料可供使用;也就是數列和其資料點會填入。All chart data is available; that is, the series and their data points are populated. 這是資料繫結正在使用，因為可以檢查資料，而且可以調整圖表之前所繪製, 的情況下尤其有用。This is especially useful if data-binding is being used, because the data can be examined and the chart can be adjusted just prior to being drawn. - 所有圖表屬性已都設定，包括已都設定為 「 自動 」 這些屬性。All chart properties have been set, including those properties that have been set to "Auto". 換句話說，「 自動 」 屬性現在儲存自動計算的值，並可以檢查及修改之前所繪製的圖表。In other words, "Auto" properties now store the automatically calculated values, and can be examined and modified prior to the chart being drawn. 範例包括並的屬性類別。Examples are the and properties of the class. 若要修改或自訂圖表影像，它繪製前使用此事件。Use this event to modify or customize the chart image before it is drawn. 以對圖表區域變更時，例如軸刻度，以圖表區域屬性必須重新計算才能正確轉譯圖表。When changes are made to a chart area, such as to the axis scale, the chart area properties must be recalculated in order to render the chart correctly. 若要重新計算圖表，請呼叫方法之後進行修改。To recalculate the chart, call the method after making modifications.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CustomizeLegend As EventHandler(Of CustomizeLegendEventArgs)

summary.span: 恰好於圖表圖例繪製前發生。

span.span: Occurs just before the chart legend is drawn.

summary.span: 使用這個事件自訂圖表圖例項目。

span.span: Use this event to customize the chart legend items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件主要是用於自訂圖例，它繪製前。The event is primarily used to customize the legend just before it is drawn. 預設和自訂圖例項目可以移除或修改，也可以加入自訂的項目。Both default and custom legend items can be removed or modified, and custom items can also be added. 此外，您可以變更圖例項目的順序。In addition, the order of legend items can be changed. 也可修改圖表影像，然後使用傳送者引數所繪製。The chart image can also be modified before being drawn by using the sender argument. 請注意，預設圖例項目是建立資料數列或資料點的項目，但自訂圖例項目未在任何圖表的資料連接。Note that a default legend item is an item that is created for either a data series or data point, but a custom legend item is not connected in any way to the chart data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CustomizeMapAreas As EventHandler(Of CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs)

summary.span: 恰好於圖表影像地圖呈現前發生。

span.span: Occurs just before the chart image map is rendered.

summary.span: 使用這個事件自訂對應區域項目。

span.span: Use this event to customize the map areas items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別可以用來：The property of the class can be used to: - 刪除或修改自動建立圖表物件; 的對應項目任何資料點，系列，圖例項目或帶狀列物件具有非空白`Url`，`MapAreaAttributes`或`ToolTip`屬性會有相關聯的對應區域物件。Delete or modify map items that have automatically been created for a chart object; any data point, series, legend item or strip line object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object. - 新增具有使用者定義的形狀和座標的自訂對應區域。Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates. > [!NOTE] > 傳送者引數的型別處於唯讀狀態。The sender argument of type is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來判斷圖表項目，如果有的話，則位於指定的點。Call this method to determine the chart element, if any, that is located at a specified point. 這個方法通常用於某些滑鼠相關事件 — 例如，MouseDown — 若要判斷其圖表項目使用者按下。This method is often used in some mouse-related event—for example, MouseDown—to determine which chart element the end-user clicked. 然後使用取自事件參數的 X 及 Y 滑鼠座標`x`和`y`的這個方法呼叫的參數值。The X and Y mouse coordinates obtained from the event parameters are then used for the `x` and `y` parameter values of this method call. 傳回的屬性物件可以再用來判斷所按的圖表項目;物件也提供選取，實際物件的執行個體，如果有的話。The properties of the returned object can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性就不會影響設為。This property has no effect if is set to . 圖表影像時呈現圖表影像使用的映像標記方法時，會產生並儲存至磁碟，在伺服器上，取決於以格式屬性。When you render a chart image using the image tag method, a chart image is generated and then saved to disk at the server, in a format that is determined by the property. 映像檔案的儲存位置的 URL 可以是絕對或相對的;映像檔案的副檔名由屬性。The URL where the image file is saved can be either absolute or relative; the file extension that the image file has is determined by the property. 硬式編碼為一律為一個檔名，可以將映像檔案，或您可以使用"#"符號來使用使用者識別碼 (Uid) 或指定的數目的唯一命名的檔案，也就是循環配置資源。The image file can be hard-coded to always be one filename, or you can use the "#" sign to use either user identifiers (UIDs) or a specified number of uniquely named files, which is known as a Round Robin.

summary.span: 將範本從影像資料流載入 控制項。

span.span: Loads a template into the control from an image stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要從資料流，例如記憶體資料流、 檔案資料流，以及其他等等載入範本，請使用這個方法。Use this method if you want to load a template from a stream, such as a memory stream, file stream, and so forth. 請務必將屬性，以`true`儲存的範本之前方法。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果已載入的範本有兩個資料數列，數列的外觀屬性會依序套用至圖表。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 換句話說，第一個範本系列外觀的屬性指派給第一個數列的圖表、 第二個範本系列外觀的屬性會套用到第二個數列的圖表，則第三個一次使用範本中第一個數列數列的圖表，依此類推。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 同樣適用於圖表區域和任何其他外觀屬性的集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 範本可用來模擬自訂調色盤。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`參數都必須使用完整路徑，例如 C:\MyPic.jpg。The `name` parameter must use a full path, for example, C:\MyPic.jpg. 請注意，您也必須指定檔案的副檔名。Note that you must also specify the file extension. 這個方法載入的範本，從使用儲存的磁碟方法。This method loads a template from disk that was saved using the method. 請務必將屬性，以`true`儲存的範本之前方法。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果已載入的範本有兩個資料數列，數列的外觀屬性會依序套用至圖表。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 換句話說，第一個範本系列外觀的屬性指派給第一個數列的圖表、 第二個範本系列外觀的屬性會套用到第二個數列的圖表，則第三個一次使用範本中第一個數列數列的圖表，依此類推。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 同樣適用於圖表區域和任何其他外觀屬性的集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 範本可用來模擬自訂調色盤。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調色盤用來自動將色彩指派給資料元素，如果已符合下列兩個條件：A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if both of the following conditions have been met: - 資料點本身並沒有指派給他們的色彩。the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them. - 資料點所屬的資料數列也沒有指派的色彩。the data series that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果明確不指定任何數列或資料點的色彩，使用的色彩取決於圖表類型和物件的調色盤或相關聯的序列，如果指定的調色盤。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the object's palette or the palette of an associated series, if one is specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果`Palette`屬性兩者並物件設為，並無色彩指派給相關的資料數列或資料點時，資料點就不會繪製，並將會顯示為 「 空白 」 的區域。If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to , and no color is assigned to the relevant data series or data points, the data points will not be drawn, and will be displayed as "empty" areas.

summary.span: 取得或設定用於顯示圖表影像的呈現方法。

value.span: 表示用來顯示圖表影像之呈現方法的 列舉值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列清單描述可以在其中呈現圖表影像的三種方式：The following list describes the three ways in which a chart image can be rendered: - 轉譯類型原因暫存檔儲存在伺服器上的磁碟。The render type causes a temporary file to be saved to disk at the server. 圖表會顯示在用戶端使用側邊\ 標記，它的 SRC 屬性設定為所指定的 URL屬性。The chart is displayed at the client side using an \ tag, with its SRC attribute set to the URL specified by the property. - 如果呈現指定型別，在伺服器上沒有暫存影像的檔案。If the render type is specified, there are no temporary image files at the server. 圖表影像會做為二進位資料流，而會顯示使用\ 標記，並且具有它的 SRC 屬性設定為另一個負責產生圖表影像的.aspx 頁面。Instead, the chart image is sent as a binary stream, and is displayed using an \ tag with its SRC attribute set to another .aspx page that is responsible for generating the chart image. - A 呈現的型別會導致影像地圖建立，但不會導致實際圖表影像的顯示方式。A render type of causes an image map to be created, but does not result in the display of an actual chart image. 使用影像地圖呈現類型時，應該只能採取此選項。This option should only be taken when using an image map that has a render type of . 請注意，您可以控制如何暫存影像檔會儲存到磁碟使用屬性。Note that you can control how temporary image files are saved to disk using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將這個屬性設定為`true`，將會隱藏非關鍵的例外狀況。If you set this property to `true`, non-critical exceptions will be suppressed. 當控制項無法正確繪製圖表使用的資料及提供其他設定，將會擲回例外狀況。When the control cannot properly plot the chart using the data and other settings provided, an exception will be thrown. 雖然顯示例外狀況很實用的應用程式測試期間，它們應該不會顯示在發行應用程式時。Although displaying exceptions is useful during application testing, they should not be shown when the application is released. > [!NOTE] > 將此屬性設定為`true`可能隱藏在使用者應用程式的原始程式碼中的嚴重問題。Setting this property to `true` may hide serious issues in the user application source code. 這項設定也可能會導致產生圖表影像，可能無法正確地表示的資料。This setting could also cause a chart image to be generated that might misrepresent your data. 強烈建議此模式中，是只用於的發行組建。It is highly recommended that this mode be only used in Release builds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來設定檢視狀態的控制項。Use this property to set the view state of the control. 當您設定此屬性時，檢視狀態會自動儲存透過控制項，並為也載入自動回傳發生時。When you set this property, the view state is automatically saved by the control, and is also loaded automatically when a postback occurs. 較大的彈性，使用使用者定義的檢視狀態的屬性。For greater flexibility, use the property for user-defined view state. 若要啟用狀態管理，請設定屬性設`true`。To enable state management, set the property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定資料保存在用戶端時，這個屬性會提供更大的彈性，相較於屬性。When you specify data to persist at the client, this property provides greater flexibility compared with the property. 實作使用者定義的檢視狀態時，它是由開發人員設定檢視狀態，並利用時回傳的檢視狀態，就會發生。When the user-defined view state is implemented, it is up to the developer to set the view state, and to utilize the view state when a postback occurs. `Save`並`Load`方法物件可以選擇性地可用來設定檢視狀態，以及有關回傳發生時載入的檢視狀態。The `Save` and `Load` methods of the object can optionally be used to set the view state, as well as to load the view state when a postback occurs. 如需此範例，請參閱下列範例程式碼。See the sample code below for an example of this. 為了簡單起見，當您指定要儲存圖表狀態時，使用屬性，可以設定資料、 視覺外觀的屬性或兩者。For simplicity, when you specify the chart state to be saved, use the property, which can be set to data, visual appearance properties or both. 若要啟用狀態管理，請設定屬性設`true`。To enable state management, set the property to `true`.
